CustomField.description: This field shows the result of the product finder process
CustomField.label: Product Finder Status

value.fullName: New combination of steel grade and rolling mill/further processing created. Only use as price indicator
value.label: New combination of steel grade and rolling mill/further processing created. Only use as price indicator

value.fullName: No matching steel grade found. Reach out to Controlling.
value.label: No matching steel grade found. Reach out to Controlling.

value.fullName: Inductive heat treatment. Reach out to Controlling.
value.label: Inductive heat treatment. Reach out to Controlling.
